page.title: 09YOUTH,AGE,SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: {POLITICAL GROUP}A thriving Conservative Association. Liberal functions are also popular. The Labour Party does not play a prominent part in this traditionally right wing area. {THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION}_ hold a parade on Poppy Day and an annual tea party for disabled ex_service men. {THE WOMENS INSTITUTE}is very active in Fletching meeting monthly for educational and social gatherings also supporting good causes. {FOR THE YOUNG }The mothers and toddlers groups. The Playgroup, (see more page 6) Sunday School and Creche, Guides, Brownies and Cubs all gather regularly. {FOR THE OVER SIXTIES}The Forget-me-Nots have arranged meetings and outings for nearly 20 years and make sure that the elderly,sick and housebound are remembered. {D Skan
